items.text: looks to go full from round the wicket, ends up sliding a fair way down the leg side
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: length ball, plenty of width, slapped firmly to cover point
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: shot! Full, angling into a fourth-stump line, and Sarkar simply shows it the full face, uses the angle nicely, and drives sweetly between the non-striker and mid-on. Was in the air briefly but it didn't matter since it was in the gap
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, bit more of a diagonal bat on this drive, hits it straight to mid-on
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball off and Soumya has smashed that. Nice stride forward, and he gets underneath the ball and extends his arms through a super drive high over mid-off
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: short now, on off stump, and Soumya puts this away too, pulls it off the front foot in front of square
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off stump, defended into the cover point region
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: ooh, some late swing away from the left-hander. Full and wide outside off, was there to drive, but the late swing takes it past Tamim's outside edge
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, opens his bat face and steers it past the gully fielder down to third man
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: shortish on off stump, rolls his wrists over on top of the bounce to play it down towards midwicket
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Aj : "Don't forget Oshane walks into this team and I have a feeling we will be seeing Kemo Paul at the World Cup."
items.text: fullish outside off, presses forward and defends with soft hands to gully
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: overpitched on off stump, and Soumya plays a wristy on-drive. Well fielded by Reifer, diving right at mid-on
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: bang. That's beautiful from Tamim. Half-volley outside off, and the front elbow is high and proud as he leans into this drive between cover point and extra-cover
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Early signs of spin. Ashley Nurse comes on with the two left-handers at the crease. Round the wicket.
items.text: tossed up full on off stump, driven into the covers
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flat length ball on off stump, stays back and punches to short extra
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: speared full on off stump, blocked back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: tossed up slower, angling in towards middle stump, gets on the front foot to clip to midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up again, drops onto a nice length and spins away from off stump, gets forward and across and defends back down the pitch
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball close to off stump, defends with soft hands to backward point
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: drifts onto the pads, Soumya clips it away to the left of fine leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling in towards middle stump, gets on the front foot to clip through square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length ball close to off stump. Looks to punch through cover point, plays a bit early and ends up hitting it back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller now, and Soumya goes hard at it, lifts it high - but not too far - over mid-off, and it drops down some 3/4ths of the way to the boundary and comes to a stop. Soumya was standing and admiring his shot, and they end up only taking a single
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: in the blockhole, angling into off stump, jams down hurriedly to flick through square leg
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
